title: Python Developer Needed for AI Automation Tool
description: We're looking for an experienced Python developer to build an AI-powered automation tool. The ideal candidate should have experience with Flask, REST APIs, and integrating AI models. This is a 2-3 week project with potential for ongoing work.

title: Full Stack Developer - React & Node.js Dashboard
description: Need a full-stack developer to create a modern analytics dashboard using React and Node.js. The project includes data visualization, real-time updates, and user authentication. Must have portfolio examples.

title: Web Scraping Expert for E-commerce Data Collection
description: Looking for a web scraping specialist to extract product data from multiple e-commerce websites. Must handle dynamic content and bypass basic anti-scraping measures. Experience with Python (BeautifulSoup/Selenium) required.

title: Mobile App Developer - Flutter iOS/Android
description: We need a Flutter developer to build a cross-platform mobile app for our startup. The app will include user authentication, real-time chat, and payment integration. Looking for someone with 3+ years Flutter experience.

title: WordPress Plugin Development for Booking System
description: Seeking a WordPress expert to develop a custom booking plugin with calendar integration, payment processing, and email notifications. Must be compatible with latest WordPress version.

title: AI/ML Engineer for Computer Vision Project
description: Looking for an experienced AI engineer to develop a computer vision model for object detection and classification. Experience with TensorFlow/PyTorch and OpenCV required. Dataset will be provided.

title: DevOps Engineer - AWS Infrastructure Setup
description: Need a DevOps expert to set up and configure AWS infrastructure including EC2, RDS, S3, and CI/CD pipelines. Must have experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and Infrastructure as Code.

title: Shopify Expert for E-commerce Store Customization
description: Looking for a Shopify developer to customize our online store theme, add custom features, and optimize for conversions. Experience with Liquid templating and Shopify APIs required.
